Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~angelo.decaro ~ales Fabric CA supports identity 'types' of 'client' and 'peer' currently. Are changes needed in Fabric CA to support the upcoming 'admin' and 'orderer' types? Or is the list dynamic?

Action.author: angelo.decaro
Action.body: I think nothing is needed cause Fabric-CA can handle any role. It is just a matter of configuration.
